name: Crop Circles
description: Recently, an aircraft surveillance party found some strange circular patterns in the nearby corn fields. When they turned on their radio transceiver to report back to mission control, they received this weird transmission which seems to be heavily encoded. We suspect extraterrestrial activity. Note: The last part of the flag is 15. Not 'fifteen' or 50.
hint: Perhaps the crop circles and the transmission share the same encoding scheme?
